item.title: 雪佛龙和欧洲公司游说保留委内瑞拉石油合资企业的股份
item.description: 三位接近此事的消息人士称，美国石油生产商雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）和几家欧洲公司正在与特朗普政府进行谈判，以获得授权保留其在与委内瑞拉国营石油公司 PDVSA 的合资企业中的股份。【原文：U.S. oil producer Chevron Corp and several European companies are in talks with the Trump administration to obtain authorizations to keep their stakes in joint ventures with Venezuela's state-run PDVSA, three sources close to the matter said.】

item.title: 法国财政部长批评赛诺菲 200 亿美元的美国投资决定
item.description: 法国财政部长周四批评了法国制药商赛诺菲到 2030 年在美国投资至少 200 亿美元的决定，因为法国的目标是让更多的公司在国内而不是国外投资。【原文：France's finance minister criticised on Thursday a decision by French drugmaker Sanofi to invest at least $20 billion in the United States through to 2030, as France aims to get more companies investing in the country rather than abroad.】

item.title: 在过去对中国的遏制之后，阿联酋将加深与美国的人工智能联系
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国有望达成一项协议，扩大从美国获得先进人工智能芯片的渠道，而此前，由于华盛顿担心中国可能获得该技术，阿联酋受到了限制。【原文：The United Arab Emirates is expected to secure a deal giving it expanded access to advanced artificial intelligence chips from the United States, after previously facing restrictions over Washington's concerns that China could get its hands on the technology.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会主席寻求将该机构裁员约 10
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会主席周四向国会表示，该委员会正寻求裁员约 10%，并坚称该机构将能以 10 年来最精简的人员继续开展反垄断和消费者保护工作。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is looking to trim its headcount by around 10%, its chairman told Congress on Thursday, insisting the agency will be able to continue antitrust and consumer protection work with what would be its smallest staff in 10 years.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Thoma Bravo 出售剩余纳斯达克股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，私募股权公司 Thoma Bravo 已出售其在纳斯达克的剩余股份，收益约为 34 亿美元。【原文：Private equity firm Thoma Bravo has sold its remaining stake in Nasdaq for proceeds of about $3.4 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: Jana Partners 在第一季度清空了 Wolfspeed 的头寸，并提交了文件
item.description: 根据周四提交的一份监管文件，去年曾推动 Wolfspeed 考虑出售以提振股价的激进投资者 Jana Partners 已退出其在这家碳化硅晶片制造商中的全部持仓。【原文：Activist investor Jana Partners, which last year pushed Wolfspeed to consider a sale to boost its share price, has exited its entire position in the silicone carbide wafer maker, according to a regulatory filing made on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息应用 Telegram 屏蔽了两项大规模黑市服务
item.description: 通信平台 Telegram 周四表示，在该平台上运营的两个规模庞大的数字黑市已被清除。【原文：Two sprawling digital black markets operating on the communications platform Telegram have been removed, the service said on Thursday.】

item.title: 文件显示，Coreweave 与 OpenAI 签订了价值 40 亿美元的新协议
item.description: 周四的一份监管文件显示，英伟达支持的人工智能公司 Coreweave 与 OpenAI 签署了一份附加协议，根据该协议，ChatGPT 制造商承诺在 2029 年 4 月之前向 Coreweave 支付高达 40 亿美元的费用。【原文：Nvidia-backed AI company Coreweave has signed an additional agreement with OpenAI under which the ChatGPT maker has committed to pay Coreweave up to $4 billion through April 2029, a regulatory filing showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称美国与阿联酋敲定技术框架协议
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，美国和阿拉伯联合酋长国已经敲定了一项技术框架协议，预计将于周四晚些时候在唐纳德-特朗普总统海湾三国之行的最后一站签署。【原文：The United States and United Arab Emirates have finalised a technology framework agreement that is expected to be signed later on Thursday during President Donald Trump's last stop of his three-country Gulf tour, a source with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 斯泰兰特董事长否认与雷诺进行合并谈判
item.description: Stellantis 董事长约翰-埃尔坎（John Elkann）周四否认了该公司正在与欧洲汽车制造商雷诺（Renault）进行合并谈判的传言。【原文：Stellantis Chairman John Elkann on Thursday denied there was any truth to rumours that the company is in merger talks with fellow European automaker Renault .】

item.title: 美国 3 月商业库存勉强增长
item.description: 由于零售商的强劲销售增长消耗了库存，3 月份美国商业库存的增幅低于预期。【原文：U.S. business inventories rose less than expected in March as robust sales growth at retailers depleted stocks there.】

item.title: 美国 4 月制造业产出因汽车生产疲软而下降
item.description: 美联储周四表示，上个月工厂产出下降了0.4%，而3月份则向上修正为增长0.4%。接受路透社调查的经济学家此前预测产量将下降0.2%，而此前的报告显示为增长0.3%。【原文：Factory output dropped 0.4% last month after an upwardly revised 0.4% gain in March, the Federal Reserve said on Thursday. Economists polled by Reuters had forecast production would slip 0.2% after a previously reported 0.3% rise.】

item.title: 路透社计算显示，俄罗斯 5 月份石油和天然气收入将减少三分之一
item.description: 路透社的计算显示，由于油价疲软和卢布走强，俄罗斯 5 月份的石油和天然气收入将比去年同期下降三分之一，降至 0.52 万亿卢布（64.8 亿美元），为 2023 年 7 月以来的最低水平。【原文：Russia's oil and gas revenue is seen falling by a third in May from a year earlier to 0.52 trillion roubles ($6.48 billion), the lowest level since July 2023 amid weaker oil prices and a stronger rouble, Reuters calculations show.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份生产者价格意外下降
item.description: 受航空旅行和酒店住宿需求减退的影响，4 月份美国生产者价格意外下降，服务成本降幅为 2009 年以来最大。【原文：U.S. producer prices unexpectedly fell in April as the cost of services declined by the most since 2009, pulled down by ebbing demand for air travel and hotel accommodation.】

item.title: 飞利浦 66 在埃利奥特压力下出售德国和奥地利零售店，缩减产品组合
item.description: 菲利普斯 66 周四表示，将把德国和奥地利燃料零售业务 65% 的股份出售给一个以私募股权投资为主导的财团，对该部门的估值为 28 亿美元，因为这家美国炼油商在激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的压力下正着手精简其投资组合。【原文：Phillips 66 said on Thursday it will sell a 65% stake in its German and Austrian fuel retail business to a private equity-led consortium, valuing the unit at $2.8 billion, as the U.S. refiner moves to streamline its portfolio amid pressure from activist investor Elliott Investment Management.】

item.title: 遭受网络攻击的 M&S 称食品供应每天都在改善
item.description: 英国零售商玛莎百货公司（Marks & Spencer）周四表示，在产品供应受到上个月网络攻击的影响后，从其配送中心流向商店的食品量已恢复到正常水平。【原文：British retailer Marks & Spencer said on Thursday food volumes flowing from its distribution centres to its stores were back to normal levels after product availability was hit by last month's cyberattack.】

item.title: 美国立法者提出法案解决人工智能芯片走私问题
item.description: 由美国两党八名议员组成的一个小组周四提出了一项法案，要求英伟达（Nvidia）等人工智能芯片制造商在出口芯片之前，必须在芯片中加入验证芯片位置的技术。【原文：A bipartisan group of eight U.S. lawmakers introduced a bill on Thursday that would require makers of artificial intelligence chips such as Nvidia to include technology to verify the location of their chips before exporting them.】

item.title: 中国小米将于 5 月底推出自主研发的移动芯片
item.description: 中国智能手机和电动汽车制造商小米公司创始人雷军周四在社交媒体平台微博上发文称，该公司将于5月底推出自主研发的移动芯片XringO1。【原文：Chinese smartphone and electric vehicle maker Xiaomi Corp will launch its self-developed mobile chip named XringO1 in late May, its founder Lei Jun said in a post on social media platform Weibo on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数不变，劳动力市场保持稳定
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量没有变化，但由于关税带来的经济不确定性阻碍了企业增加招聘，失业者的就业机会正变得越来越少。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits was unchanged last week, but job opportunities are becoming more scarce for those out of work as economic uncertainty from tariffs discourages businesses from boosting hiring.】

item.title: 贝莱德高管薪酬在年会上赢得 67% 的支持率
item.description: 顶级资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）周四表示，在其年度会议上，67%的投票支持其高管薪酬，这是一个相对较低的水平。【原文：Top asset manager BlackRock said on Thursday that 67% of votes cast at its annual meeting were in support of its executive pay, a relatively low level.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔需要重新考虑围绕就业和通胀的策略
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周四表示，鉴于过去几年的通胀经历，以及未来几年供应冲击和相关价格上涨可能变得更加频繁，美国联邦储备委员会官员认为他们需要重新考虑当前货币政策方法中围绕就业和通胀的关键要素。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve officials feel they need to reconsider the key elements around both jobs and inflation in their current approach to monetary policy given the inflation experience of the last few years and the possibility that supply shocks and the associated price increases may become more frequent in the years ahead, Fed chair Jerome Powell said Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份零售额勉强增长
item.description: 美国 4 月份零售销售增长放缓，原因是在经济前景不明朗的背景下，家庭在关税前购买汽车的提振作用减弱，而且家庭减少了其他支出。【原文：U.S. retail sales growth slowed in April as the boost from households front-loading motor vehicle purchases ahead of tariffs faded and households pulled back on other spending against the backdrop of an uncertain economic outlook.】

item.title: 欧洲央行希望在 2026 年初就数字欧元达成政治协议
item.description: 欧洲央行董事会成员皮耶罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）周四表示，欧洲央行希望在明年年初之前制定出发行数字欧元的所有政治决策，然后需要两到三年的时间来推出这种货币。【原文：The European Central Bank hopes to have all the political decisions in place by early next year to issue a digital euro and would then need two to three years to launch the currency, ECB board member Piero Cipollone said on Thursday.】

item.title: 纽约联储帝国制造业指数 5 月下滑
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周四公布的最新帝国制造业调查显示，5 月份纽约联邦储备银行所在地区的商业活动继续疲软。【原文：Business activity continued to soften in the Federal Reserve Bank of New York's district during May, according to its latest Empire State Manufacturing Survey, released Thursday.】

item.title: 减肥药热销推动沃特世公司印度业务增长
item.description: 总部位于美国的沃特斯公司（Waters Corp）生产用于临床测试的医疗设备，该公司的一位高级管理人员告诉路透社记者，印度的制药商急于开发其流行的减肥药，因此需求激增。【原文：U.S.-based Waters Corp , which makes medical equipment used in clinical testing, has seen a spurt in demand from drugmakers in India rushing to develop their versions of popular weight-loss drugs, a senior executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 人工智能视频生成器初创公司 Hedra 获 Andreessen Horowitz 领投的 3200 万美元融资
item.description: Hedra是一家帮助企业生成逼真视频的人工智能初创公司，该公司表示已在安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）的基础设施基金（Infrastructure fund）领投的一轮融资中筹集到3200万美元，用于扩大业务和加深在营销人员中的影响力。【原文：Hedra, an AI startup that helps businesses generate lifelike videos, said it has raised $32 million in a funding round led by Andreessen Horowitz's Infrastructure fund to expand operations and deepen its reach among marketers.】

item.title: 阿根廷大豆种植农争分夺秒抢收雨季大豆
item.description: 在克里斯蒂安-贾科博内位于阿根廷潘帕斯平原中心的农场里，大豆田里的工人们从黎明就起床了，赶在新一轮暴风雨来临之前收割被雨水耽搁的作物，因为暴风雨会增加脱粒的难度。【原文：On Cristian Giacobone's farm in the heart of Argentina's Pampas plains, workers in the soy fields have been up since dawn, racing to harvest the rain-delayed crop before the arrival of new storms that will make threshing more difficult.】

item.title: CoreWeave 在上市后的首份财报中公布了人工智能支出计划，股价随之下滑
item.description: CoreWeave 股价在周四的盘前交易中下跌超过 5%，此前这家由英伟达（Nvidia）支持的人工智能公司公布了资本支出计划，以满足蓬勃发展的需求。【原文：CoreWeave shares fell more than 5% in premarket trading on Thursday, after the Nvidia-backed artificial intelligence company unveiled its capital expenditure plans to meet booming demand.】

item.title: ASM 将把关税成本转嫁给买家，称与同行相比并无劣势
item.description: 荷兰芯片制造设备供应商ASM国际公司首席执行官和财务总监周四在一次会议上告诉美国银行，该公司计划将与关税有关的任何成本增加转嫁给包括客户在内的价值链。【原文：Dutch chip-making equipment supplier ASM International plans to pass on any cost increases related to tariffs to its value chain, including customers, its CEO and finance chief told Bank of America in a meeting, a report on the analysts' takeaways showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 沃尔玛警告价格上涨，暂缓发布第二季度利润指引
item.description: 沃尔玛美国第一季度可比销售额超过预期，但这家以平价商品著称的零售业巨头表示，高昂的关税成本可能意味着它无法在短期内将更高的价格转嫁给购物者。【原文：Walmart U.S. comparable sales surpassed expectations in the first quarter, but the retailing giant known for affordable goods said the high costs of tariffs may mean it cannot keep from passing on higher prices to shoppers in the near-future.】
